title: Linux usermod Command with Practical Examples
description: Explore the Linux usermod command and learn how to modify user account properties, change a user's primary group, and disable user account expiration using practical examples.

meta.title: Linux usermod Command with Practical Examples
meta.description: Explore the Linux usermod command and learn how to modify user account properties, change a user's primary group, and disable user account expiration using practical examples.
meta.keywords: Linux, usermod, user management, permissions, account properties, primary group, account expiration

verify.name: Verify user full name
verify.hint: The user's full name is not set to "John Doe" as expected.

verify.name: Verify user's primary group
verify.hint: The user's primary group is not set to "developers" as expected.

verify.name: Verify user account expiration
verify.hint: The user account expiration is not disabled as expected.
